name: Overhead Triceps Stretch
setup: Stand or sit with spine tall and neutral
Bend elbow, bringing hand down behind head toward shoulder blade
steps: Reach opposite hand over to grasp bent elbow
Gently pull elbow toward midline and slightly back
Keep ribs down and avoid arching lower back
Feel stretch along back of upper arm (triceps)
safety: Should feel gentle stretch in triceps, not shoulder joint pain. If shoulder discomfort, reduce range or skip. Avoid aggressive pulling if recent shoulder or elbow injury.

regressions: Doorway triceps stretch (arm extended on doorframe)
Reduce range of motion - don't pull hand as far down back
Use towel or strap to gently assist stretch
progressions: Triceps stretch with slight side bend

prescriptionHints.notes: After pressing or triceps training. Gentle sustained stretch to release muscle tension.

joints.notes: Keep ribs down to avoid compensatory lower back arch. If shoulder or elbow pain, reduce range or skip.
